cause.description:
We must destroy noobs! All the 1337 people, unite and make the world a better place for gosus and the rest of the non-noob population. By donating money to a random Korean institute, perhaps they will give the money to all those Korean powergamers, who will destroy all noobs on this planet.
1. Noobs suck
2. Noobs ruin games
3. Noobs are retarded
4. Noobs must die
5. Noobs cannot win
cause.name: Destroy all Noobs
